review: I wish I had this long ago. I love watching my Youtube videos and Netflix, but sometimes my computer screen just isn't big enough and I'm not a fan of going through my PS4. This is awesome. Using my TVs HDMI control setting, I just hit the little alternate screen icon and my TV changes to the Chromecast input. Either my computer or smartphone works well. The video quality is great and the number of compatible apps is plenty for me.I can also throw up photos or videos I've take if I want to share them with others instead of passing around my phone. I don't really have a need for that, but it's nice to know that it's there.I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
